title: ‘There’s More to Come’: American Rookie Luke Lamperti Edges Closer to First Pro Win with Second
content:
In four pro races so far in his rookie WorldTour season, the Californian's hit podiums in two: 'It's a nice way to start the week.'

Read the full article at ‘There’s More to Come’: American Rookie Luke Lamperti Edges Closer to First Pro Win with Second on Velo.
author: ahood
